name: Conveyor_Controller
info:
This node takes a msg object in the format:

{
    Destiny: String,
    C1: int,
    C2: int,
    C3: int,
    C4: int
}

The value of Destiny corresponds to the conveyor belt where the product needs to stop, i.e. if the product has to stop at the conveyor belt number 3, the value of Destiny will be C3.

C1 through C4 correspond to the orientation of the conveyors, if the value provided is 1, that conveyor will move to the right, -1 will move it to the left and 0 will stop it.

name: C1
C2
C3
C4
